Based on your preferences and cues, I would recommend 'The Pianist' (2002) for you.

The story is about Wladyslaw Plichko who was a Polish musician during WWII. He was asked by the Soviet government to write music that could be used as propaganda in the war effort against Germany.  In addition, he received money from the Soviet government for each piece of music that he wrote.  As a result, he became one of the most famous musicians in all of Europe, and his music has been used as propaganda by the Soviet government during World War II.
